items.name: Widowhail
implicits: (150-250)% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
items.flavor_text: "A volley of arrows were loosed from my bow into the heart of the man who slew my beloved. I felt nothing but cold fury." - Chieftain Enoroa

items.name: Quill Rain
items.flavor_text: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle present into past, life into death." - Rigwald of the Ezomytes

items.name: Splinterheart
items.flavor_text: The forests of the Vastiri held many secrets mystical and dark. Men learned not to wander, lest they return with a strange new purpose.

items.name: Doomfletch
modifiers: Attacks with this Weapon gain 50% of Physical damage as Extra damage of each Element
items.flavor_text: "Toasted or frozen Or twitching in the light I'm not fussy And neither is Death." - Koralus Doomfletch

items.name: Death's Harp
implicits: Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow
items.flavor_text: The mournful music of the strings, The creaking arch, the arrow sings. A choking cry, a rattled breath, The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

items.name: Slivertongue
modifiers: Leeches (5-8)% of Physical Damage as Life
Leeches (4-7)% of Physical Damage as Mana
Arrows Pierce all targets after Forking
items.flavor_text: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

items.name: Voltaxic Rift
modifiers: 100% of Lightning Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Chaos Damage from Hits also Contributes to Shock Chance
items.flavor_text: The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning rained down. Metal withered and flesh melted before its arcane power. There was no escape, no shelter. Only despair.

items.name: Mist Whisper
items.flavor_text: Sibilant promises surrounded them in the night. All the travelers had to give him was their devotion...

items.name: Rampart Raptor
modifiers: 100% chance to not consume a bolt if you've Reloaded Recently
items.flavor_text: "His approach to the gate was met with sounding trumpets and an unfurling of banners. He never saw it coming." - anonymous Brotherhood of Silence report

items.name: Winter's Bite
modifiers: Freezes Enemies that are on Full Life
items.flavor_text: Nothing stabs colder than pure hatred.

items.name: Brynhand's Mark
items.flavor_text: The mark of the smith was widely known.

items.name: Wylund's Stake
modifiers: Apply Fire Exposure when fully breaking enemy Armour
items.flavor_text: Shaped metal never forgets the forge.

items.name: Frostbreath
modifiers: All Damage from Hits with this Weapon Contributes to Freeze Buildup
items.flavor_text: A merciful murderer swept through the streets of Sarn Robbing breath from the weak and worthless.

items.name: Trenchtimbre
modifiers: +(1-2) to Level of all Minion Skills
Increases and Reductions to Minion Attack Speed also affect you
items.flavor_text: Ezomyte loyalty was not given to distant leaders. It was earned by comrades in arms.

items.name: Sculpted Suffering
modifiers: Breaks Armour equal to 40% of damage from Hits with this weapon
Fully Armour Broken enemies you kill with Hits Shatter
items.flavor_text: The Abyssals were created, not born, and every moment in the light was agony.

items.name: Seeing Stars
items.flavor_text: Within lies a window.

items.name: Nebuloch
modifiers: Attacks consume an Endurance Charge to Critically Hit
Take 100 Chaos damage per second per Endurance Charge
items.flavor_text: They hoped that, trapped in its prison, the creature would age and perish. But time would not touch the fiend.

items.name: Olrovasara
modifiers: On Hitting an enemy, gains maximum added Lightning damage equal to the enemy's Power for 6 seconds, up to a total of 500
items.flavor_text: True heroes grow stronger in the face of adversity." - Fourth Tenet of the Knights of the Sun

items.name: Mjlner
modifiers: +1 to Level of all Lightning Skills
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (16-20) Lightning Spell on Melee Hit
items.flavor_text: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

items.name: Hoghunt
items.flavor_text: There was a very clear and delicious reason why the Ezomytes chose to stop their flight and settle in Phaaryl.

items.name: Hrimnor's Hymn
modifiers: Slam Skills you use yourself cause Aftershocks
items.flavor_text: "The crack of bone, the spray of blood. Is there sweeter music?" - Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

items.name: Trephina
modifiers: Always deals Critical Hits against Heavy Stunned Enemies
items.flavor_text: The art of surgery advances one mistake at a time.

items.name: Brain Rattler
modifiers: All damage with this Weapon causes Electrocution buildup
items.flavor_text: The mind may have no limits, but the skull sure does.

items.name: The Empty Roar
implicits: Strikes deal Splash damage to targets within 1.8 metres
modifiers: Leeches 10% of Physical Damage as Life
(20-30)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
All Attacks count as Empowered Attacks
items.flavor_text: Secrecy and silence are powers all their own.

items.name: Shyaba
items.flavor_text: Be not deceived by the treachery of men.

items.name: Chober Chaber
modifiers: Increases and Reductions to Minion Damage also affect you
items.flavor_text: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

items.name: Quecholli
implicits: Causes Enemies to Explode on Critical Kill for 10% of their Life as Physical Damage
modifiers: This Weapon's Critical Hit Chance is 100%
Critical Hits do not deal extra Damage
items.flavor_text: "The finest prosperity grows from the direst carnage. Such is the nature of progress." - Doryani of the Vaal

items.name: Tidebreaker
modifiers: +(2-3) to Level of all Melee Skills
All Damage from Hits with this Weapon Contributes to Chill Magnitude
items.flavor_text: The sea strikes the rock relentlessly. Whether in one day or in ten thousand years, eventually the rock will crumble, and the Brine King's domain will grow.

items.name: The Hammer of Faith
modifiers: Gain a random shrine buff every 10 seconds
items.flavor_text: The secret Order endured by publicly praying however the Templars demanded. One day, justice would fall upon them...

items.name: Pillar of the Caged God
modifiers: 1% increased Area of Effect for Attacks per 10 Intelligence
items.flavor_text: Forged to rule the waves and tide Destined to serve the monkey's paw Strong as a tower of iron Deft as the needle doubt

items.name: The Blood Thorn
items.flavor_text: Touch not the thorn, for only blood and pain await.

items.name: The Sentry
items.flavor_text: The night Draven attacked, Erian was asleep at his post.

items.name: Matsya
items.flavor_text: In our tales, and in our hearts, the rivers still flow.

items.name: Nazir's Judgement
modifiers: Causes Daze buildup equal to 100% of Damage dealt
items.flavor_text: The first witch hunter knew one critical tactic: never let your enemy have a clear moment.

items.name: Collapsing Horizon
modifiers: +(2-4) to Level of all Elemental Skills
Trigger skills refund half of Energy spent
items.flavor_text: The edges bend, the world flexes, the infinite spills into view.

items.name: The Dark Defiler
modifiers: Gain 5% of Damage as Chaos Damage per Undead Minion
items.flavor_text: Rare is the Necromancer who leads his undead armies from the front.

items.name: Font of Power
modifiers: When a Party Member in your Presence Casts a Spell, you Sacrifice 20% of Mana and they Leech that Mana
items.flavor_text: Tale-women may not fight directly, for they have a much higher purpose.

items.name: Guiding Palm
modifiers: Allies in your Presence deal (3-5) to (6-8) additional Attack Cold Damage
50% of your Life Regeneration is granted to Allies in your Presence
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (7-20) Purity of Ice
items.flavor_text: The stories we tell serve to unite us.

items.name: Guiding Palm
modifiers: Allies in your Presence deal 1 to (10-15) additional Attack Lightning Damage
50% of your Life Regeneration is granted to Allies in your Presence
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (7-20) Purity of Lightning
items.flavor_text: The stories we tell serve to unite us.

items.name: Guiding Palm
modifiers: Allies in your Presence deal (4-6) to (7-10) additional Attack Fire Damage
50% of your Life Regeneration is granted to Allies in your Presence
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (8-20) Purity of Fire
items.flavor_text: The stories we tell serve to unite us.

items.name: Sacred Flame
modifiers: Gain (40-60)% of Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Allies in your Presence Gain (20-30)% of Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Allies in your Presence Regenerate (2-3)% of their Maximum Life per second
Enemies in your Presence Resist Elemental Damage based on their Lowest Resistance
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level 19 Purity of Fire
items.flavor_text: Fire destroys, but fire also purifies. Life always springs anew.

items.name: Splinter of Loratta
modifiers: 20% increased Melee Strike Range with this weapon
Any number of Poisons from this Weapon can affect a target at the same time
Always Poison on Hit with this weapon
items.flavor_text: The Baleful Gem's corruption lingers still...

items.name: Tyranny's Grip
modifiers: Strikes deal Splash damage to targets within 1.8 metres
items.flavor_text: The might of the Eternal Empire was formidable, but rebels of every culture stood together as one.

items.name: Chainsting
modifiers: All Damage from Hits with this Weapon Contributes to Pin Buildup
(20-30)% increased Projectile Speed with this Weapon
items.flavor_text: The Sacred Hunt ends with mercy.

items.name: Skysliver
modifiers: Rolls only the minimum or maximum Damage value for each Damage Type
items.flavor_text: Heads fall to the sand, just as the star fell from the sky

items.name: Daevata's Wind
modifiers: (30-60)% increased Melee Damage if you've dealt a Projectile Attack Hit in the past eight seconds
(30-60)% increased Projectile Damage if you've dealt a Melee Hit in the past eight seconds
items.flavor_text: As the flow of battle demanded, she became a sudden storm or a vanishing wind.

items.name: Tangletongue
modifiers: 10% of Skill Mana Costs Converted to Life Costs
items.flavor_text: "In the hands of Orbala, it made a god bleed." - Wranga, tale-woman of the Wahida akhara

items.name: Saitha's Spear
modifiers: (15-25)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
Aggravating any Bleeding with this Weapon also Aggravates all Ignites on the target
(26-40)% chance to Aggravate Bleeding on Hit
items.flavor_text: Born in a star of man's own make, fused to her hand by her last mistake.

items.name: Spire of Ire
modifiers: Leeches (6-10)% of Physical Damage as Life
When you Consume a Charge Trigger Chaotic Infusion to gain 2 Chaos Infusion
Life Leech recovers based on your Chaos damage instead of Physical damage
items.flavor_text: The spear was specially forged to assassinate Voll, but Maligaro never got a chance to use it...

items.name: Dusk Vigil
modifiers: Trigger Ember Fusillade Skill on casting a Spell
items.flavor_text: The candlemass tradition was born in a time of darkness and fear.

items.name: Earthbound
modifiers: Trigger Spark Skill on killing a Shocked Enemy
items.flavor_text: An ancient Azmeri staff, overgrown by roots...

items.name: Taryn's Shiver
modifiers: Enemies Frozen by you take 50% increased Damage
items.flavor_text: Shed by the winged beast of night, A scaly frost-encrusted thorn. All who feel its wintry light Shiver in pain at the frozen dawn.

items.name: The Searing Touch
modifiers: 100% increased Magnitude of Ignite you inflict
items.flavor_text: Burn to cinders, scar and maim, Rule a world, bathed in flame.

items.name: Sire of Shards
modifiers: Spells fire Projectiles in a circle
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (7-20) Sigil of Power
items.flavor_text: That which was broken may yet break.

items.name: The Burden of Shadows
modifiers: Skill Mana Costs Converted to Life Costs
Skills gain 1% of Damage as Chaos Damage per 3 Life Cost
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (18-19) Sigil of Power
items.flavor_text: Nothingness is loathe to relinquish its grip. Every moment is a struggle to exist.

items.name: Bluetongue
modifiers: 100% increased Attack Damage while not on Low Mana

items.name: Redbeak
modifiers: 100% increased Attack Damage when on Low Life
items.flavor_text: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.

items.name: The Dancing Dervish
modifiers: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends
Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
items.flavor_text: Take your partner by the hand, Keep your steps in time. Swing together, spin apart, And dance with death sublime.

items.name: Lifesprig
modifiers: +(1-3) to Level of all Spell Skill Gems
Leeches 1% of maximum Life when you Cast a Spell
items.flavor_text: From the Smallest seeds To the tallest redwoods Life endures in Wraeclast.

items.name: Sanguine Diviner
modifiers: 25% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit
25% of Spell Mana Cost Converted to Life Cost
items.flavor_text: One way or another, it will find what it seeks.

items.name: The Wicked Quill
modifiers: Spells have a 25% chance to inflict Withered for 4 seconds on Hit
items.flavor_text: With a flick of the finger, their fates are written, the pages torn to a million pieces.

items.name: Enezun's Charge
modifiers: (30-50)% increased Critical Hit Chance for Spells
25% chance to not destroy Corpses when Consuming Corpses
items.flavor_text: He alone was welcome in the sacred spaces of the Titans.

items.name: Cursecarver
items.flavor_text: Lost in the Black Fen, Erian hoped that dawn would save him. He had no idea how far away the light truly was.

items.name: Dionadair
modifiers: Double Stun Threshold while Shield is Raised
items.flavor_text: Praetor Draven knew his only chance to subjugate the Ezomytes was to catch them unaware.

items.name: Wulfsbane
items.flavor_text: The Counts of Ogham share a legacy of cunning and power.

items.name: Doomgate
modifiers: You take 20% of damage from Blocked hits
items.flavor_text: Welcome to Wraeclast.

items.name: Window to Paradise
modifiers: Apply Elemental Exposure to Enemies 3 metres in front of you for 4 seconds while Shield is raised
items.flavor_text: "Beyond fire, blood, and nightmare, the Savior will build utopia."

items.name: The Wailing Wall
modifiers: Can Block Damage from all Hits
items.flavor_text: Some stories are never told.

items.name: Lycosidae
modifiers: Blocking damage poisons the enemy as though dealing 200 base Chaos damage
items.flavor_text: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

items.name: Redblade Banner
modifiers: Enemies in your Presence count as having double Power
items.flavor_text: Blood shed is blood shared.

items.name: The Surrender
modifiers: Recover 4% of Life when you Block
items.flavor_text: Our hearts cry out but are silenced by our flesh and so we give up our flesh.

items.name: Chernobog's Pillar
modifiers: Gain 1% of damage as Fire damage per 1% Chance to Block
items.flavor_text: Fire dances with those who doubt Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful Where there is no fear There is no flame

items.name: Svalinn
items.flavor_text: The priests found the Great Shield the night it fell to Middengard, but it was the smiths who delved into the secrets it held.

items.name: Arvil's Wheel
items.flavor_text: The unending carnage of war mercilessly grinds away at body and mind.

items.name: Merit of Service
modifiers: Allies in Presence have Block Chance equal to yours
items.flavor_text: Lead by example, and you shall never be alone.

items.name: Feathered Fortress
modifiers: No Movement speed penalty while shield is raised
items.flavor_text: Ride the western wind, and take flight.

items.name: Alkem Eira
modifiers: Damage Blocked is Recouped as Mana
items.flavor_text: May your resolve never waver.

items.name: Oaksworn
items.flavor_text: The druids swore to protect the Grelwood with their very lives.

items.name: Saffell's Frame
modifiers: Modifiers to maximum Block Chance instead apply to Maximum Resistances
items.flavor_text: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.

items.name: Crest of Ardura
items.flavor_text: When the Red Sekhema called, the Ardura were the first to answer.

items.name: Prism Guardian
modifiers: +1 to Maximum Spirit per 50 Maximum Life
items.flavor_text: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

items.name: Rise of the Phoenix
modifiers: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
Regenerate 3% of Life per second while on Low Life
items.flavor_text: My bearer shall be guarded by flame, for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

items.name: Mahuxotl's Machination
modifiers: 100% increased effect of Socketed Soul Cores
items.flavor_text: The Banished Architect sought to employ the darkest secrets of the Vaal.

items.name: Dunkelhalt
modifiers: You take 50% of damage from Blocked Hits
items.flavor_text: "A thief in the night, Draven did creep, families asleep, taken, held on high. Clever, he thought, 'til his children paid. Nay, villain, a man never bleeds alone."

items.name: Nocturne
modifiers: Parried enemies take more Spell Damage instead of more Attack Damage
items.flavor_text: Light and shadow chase eternal, but neither knows the other exists...

items.name: Rondel de Ezo
modifiers: Curse Enemies with Enfeeble on Block
items.flavor_text: "Resist for long enough, and your oppressor will lose his will. Then, you've won."

items.name: Bloodbarrier
modifiers: Inflict Corrupted Blood for 5 seconds on Block, dealing 50% of your maximum Life as Physical damage per second
items.flavor_text: A window onto a realm of red, where countless voices scream...

items.name: Silverthorne
modifiers: Parrying applies 10 Stacks of Critical Weakness
items.flavor_text: As a boy, in the arena, Daresso learned to feign weakness to open up a lethal blow.

items.name: Calgyra's Arc
items.flavor_text: "There is nowhere my vengeance cannot find you."

items.name: Sunsplinter
modifiers: +(1-3) to Level of all Cold Skills
+(1-3) to Level of all Fire Skills
+(1-3) to Level of all Lightning Skills
items.flavor_text: "Lundara held back the hordes, while Solerai rose to split the sky. With a single stroke, she ended the Winter of the World." - Wranga, tale-woman of the Wahida akhara

items.name: Deathrattle
modifiers: 20% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you Kill an Enemy
items.flavor_text: The cry of death whispers in the wind.

items.name: Threaded Light
items.flavor_text: A gift, a braid, of golden hair. The war, forgotten. The reason, remembered.

items.name: Effigy of Cruelty
modifiers: Critical Hits with Spells apply (3-5) Stacks of Critical Weakness
items.flavor_text: The horrors we imagined as children still exist somewhere in the dark...

items.name: Carrion Call
modifiers: Minion's Resistances are equal to yours
items.flavor_text: Obedience stretches beyond the grave.

items.name: Serpent's Lesson
modifiers: You count as on Low Life while at 35% of maximum Mana or below
You count as on Low Mana while at 35% of maximum Life or below
items.flavor_text: Sinuous, entwined... inextricable.

items.name: The Eternal Spark
modifiers: 40% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while stationary
items.flavor_text: A flash of blue, a stormcloud's kiss, her motionless dance the pulse of bliss

items.name: Apep's Supremacy
modifiers: (30-50)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
20% of Elemental damage from Hits taken as Chaos damage
items.flavor_text: Give him your body, and your burdens will follow.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
modifiers: Non-Channelling Spells cost an additional 6% of your maximum Life
Non-Channelling Spells have 5% increased Critical Hit Chance per 100 maximum Life
Non-Channelling Spells deal 10% increased Damage per 100 maximum Life
items.flavor_text: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts, and left a mountain of twitching dead.

items.name: Asphyxia's Wrath
modifiers: Adds (3-4) to (5-8) Cold Damage to Attacks
Enemies Chilled by your Hits increase damage taken by Chill Magnitude
Attacks Gain (5-10)% of Damage as Extra Cold Damage
items.flavor_text: Mist of breath Icing to lips and throat As the warm ones choke and fall Upon the frozen wasteland.
items.help_text: Can only be equipped if you are wielding a Bow.

items.name: Blackgleam
implicits: Adds 3 to 5 Fire Damage to Attacks
modifiers: Adds (3-5) to (6-9) Fire Damage to Attacks
Attacks Gain (5-10)% of Damage as Extra Fire Damage
items.flavor_text: Molten feathers, veiled spark, Hissing arrows from the dark.
items.help_text: Can only be equipped if you are wielding a Bow.

items.name: The Lethal Draw
implicits: Gain (2-3) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
modifiers: Gain 5 Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Bow Attacks consume 10% of your maximum Life Flask Charges if possible to deal added Physical damage equal to 5% of Flask's Life Recovery amount
items.flavor_text: Life and death ooze from the same sap.
items.help_text: Can only be equipped if you are wielding a Bow.

items.name: Rearguard
modifiers: Adds (7-11) to (14-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
items.flavor_text: "It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head." - Kiravi, Vaal Archer
items.help_text: Can only be equipped if you are wielding a Bow.

items.name: Beyond Reach
implicits: (20-30)% increased Critical Hit Chance for Attacks
modifiers: Chaos Damage from Hits also Contributes to Freeze Buildup
Chaos Damage from Hits also Contributes to Electrocute Buildup
Attacks Gain (10-20)% of Physical Damage as extra Chaos Damage
items.flavor_text: The limit of our knowledge is a barrier that protects us from ourselves.

items.name: Blackbraid
items.flavor_text: An Ezomyte endures.

items.name: Bramblejack
modifiers: 250% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker
Regenerate 5% of Life per second while Surrounded
items.flavor_text: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

items.name: Edyrn's Tusks
modifiers: 50% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit
50% reduced Slowing Potency of Debuffs on You
items.flavor_text: In death, the legendary boar's tusks were turned to the slaying of Phaaryl's Eternal oppressors.

items.name: The Road Warrior
modifiers: Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra damage
items.flavor_text: That most legendary caravan bandit had one rule: never let them see you flinch.

items.name: Titanrot Cataphract
items.flavor_text: Not the sound of thunder on the wind, but the Rhoaback Riders - Death charging from the sands.

items.name: Wandering Reliquary
modifiers: 50% of Physical Damage prevented Recouped as Life
items.flavor_text: Knowing she could outlast any opponent, Wrashmin fought not to win, but to delay.

items.name: Kingsguard
modifiers: Recover 5% of Life for each Endurance Charge consumed
items.flavor_text: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

items.name: Greed's Embrace
items.flavor_text: Some would question if the risk was worth it. The rest were already dead.

items.name: The Brass Dome
modifiers: Take no Extra Damage from Critical Hits
items.flavor_text: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

items.name: Kaom's Heart
items.flavor_text: The warrior who fears will fall.

items.name: Bristleboar
modifiers: Gain 5 Rage when Hit by an Enemy
Gain 10 Rage when Critically Hit by an Enemy
items.flavor_text: When cornered and desperate, look within for the rage to break loose.

items.name: Foxshade
modifiers: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
100% increased Evasion Rating when on Full Life
items.flavor_text: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

items.name: Ashrend
modifiers: -10 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
items.flavor_text: The blasted oak stands forever.

items.name: Sands of Silk
items.flavor_text: The desert is ever flowing.

items.name: Briskwrap
items.flavor_text: "I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men." - Taruk of the Wildmen

items.name: Dustbloom
modifiers: 0.5% of Life Regenerated per second per Fragile Regrowth
10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Fragile Regrowth
Lose all Fragile Regrowth when Hit
items.flavor_text: Wraeclast has suffered many great disasters, but life always springs back anew.

items.name: The Rat Cage
modifiers: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage
items.flavor_text: The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

items.name: Quatl's Molt
items.flavor_text: As the serpent wills.

items.name: Queen of the Forest
modifiers: 1% increased Movement Speed per 800 Evasion Rating
Other Modifiers to Movement Speed do not apply
items.flavor_text: Shedding away her regal past, she forged a new destiny. Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. Seizing her one true wish, she found peace at last.

items.name: Yriel's Fostering
modifiers: You can have two Companions of different types
items.flavor_text: Feed a beast and it will not hunt. Protect it and it will not fight. Ferocity must be learned, not taught. It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

items.name: Hyrri's Ire
modifiers: Adds (13-20) to (21-31) Cold damage to Attacks
Can Evade all Hits if you have not been Hit Recently
items.flavor_text: Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows, tipped with a poisoned hatred only oppression can ferment.

items.name: Ghostwrithe
modifiers: 25% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield
items.flavor_text: Faith Springs Abundant at the edge of Death

items.name: Bitterbloom
modifiers: Energy Shield Recharge starts when you use a Mana Flask
items.flavor_text: The soul cannot flourish in a doubting mind.

items.name: The Black Doubt
modifiers: Damage over Time bypasses Energy Shield
While not on Full Life, Sacrifice 10% of Mana per Second to Recover that much Life
items.flavor_text: Suspicion is a sinister shadow slithering in the soul.

items.name: Necromantle
modifiers: Minions gain (20-30)% of their Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
items.flavor_text: Fueled by the blackness in the hearts of men, the armies of Saresh were just as relentless.

items.name: Cloak of Flame
modifiers: 40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage
items.flavor_text: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

items.name: Prayers for Rain
modifiers: 30% slower start of Energy Shield Recharge
Energy Shield Recharge is not interrupted by Damage if Recharge began Recently
items.flavor_text: In its final era, the roofs of Keth were rife with anything and everything that could hold water... should the opportunity arise.

items.name: Tetzlapokal's Desire
items.flavor_text: A faith born of flesh.

items.name: The Covenant
modifiers: 5% of Spell Damage Leeched as Life
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 50% of Base Mana Cost
items.flavor_text: My Soul is your Strength My Price is your Blood

items.name: Gloamgown
modifiers: Your base Energy Shield Recharge Delay is 10 seconds
items.flavor_text: The tale-women of old knew how to build anticipation.

items.name: Vis Mortis
items.flavor_text: Reap what others have sown Muster them from their graves Parade them for your pleasure Zealots in mortis enslaved

items.name: Temporalis
modifiers: (5-30)% of Damage taken is Recouped as Life
(5-30)% of Damage taken is Recouped as Mana
items.flavor_text: The final element the tale-women mastered was Time itself.

items.name: Cloak of Defiance
modifiers: 30% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life
items.flavor_text: When the throat roars, As eyes weep, When the hand grips hard With trembling fingers, When belly twists Yet legs stand strong, That is the work Of the Defiant Heart.

items.name: Silks of Veneration
modifiers: Current Energy Shield also grants Elemental Damage reduction
items.flavor_text: Hallowed Dordalus was cast into the pit as a heretic, but his piety was so great, he would not burn. He rose again, lauded, his faith forever changed... but not the way the Templar believed.

items.name: Coat of Red
modifiers: 25% chance to be inflicted with bleeding when Hit
items.flavor_text: For those noble families obsessed with keeping their bloodline pure, there was a price to pay...

items.name: The Barrow Dweller
modifiers: Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life
50% chance to Avoid Death from Hits
items.flavor_text: In the mists they dwell, forever hungry, forever cold.

items.name: Irongrasp
items.flavor_text: A power unknown aids your own.

items.name: Pariah's Embrace
items.flavor_text: His isolation caused him to treasure their companionship all the more.

items.name: Belly of the Beast
modifiers: Life Recovery from Flasks is instant
items.flavor_text: There is no safer place Than the Belly of the Beast

items.name: Pragmatism
items.flavor_text: In an endless war against darkness, one must be ever vigilant.

items.name: Doryani's Prototype
modifiers: Armour also applies to Lightning damage taken from Hits
Enemies in your Presence have Lightning Resistance equal to yours
Lightning Resistance does not affect Lightning damage taken
items.flavor_text: "This was the first step in some grand design, lost to the ages, now ours to decipher." - Dominus, High Templar

items.name: Perfidy
modifiers: (10-40)% chance to Avoid Physical Damage from Hits
(10-40)% chance to Avoid Chaos Damage from Hits
Enemies in your Presence are Intimidated
items.flavor_text: The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other. What hope have you?

items.name: Widow's Reign
modifiers: Life that would be lost by taking Damage is instead Reserved until you take no Damage to Life for 5 seconds
items.flavor_text: That day, both the Unblinking Eye and their enemies stood in silence. That day, the sky was clear, but it was raining.

items.name: The Fallen Formation
items.flavor_text: "I will never forget. I will carry your memory forward, all of you, from this ghastly Vale." - Artair, last survivor of the Ogham rebellion

items.name: The Coming Calamity
modifiers: Enemies in your Presence have no Elemental Resistances
granted_skills: Grants Skill: Level (16-20) Herald of Ash
Grants Skill: Level (16-20) Herald of Ice
Grants Skill: Level (16-20) Herald of Thunder
items.flavor_text: Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark. Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm. Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight. By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

items.name: Enfolding Dawn
modifiers: Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Maximum Mana
items.flavor_text: The gleam of the night and the howling teeth alike could not abate the rising of the sun.

items.name: Icetomb
modifiers: Freeze as though dealing Cold damage equal to 10% of your maximum Mana when Hit
items.flavor_text: When Solaris closes his burning eye At the end of time, the world will perish in ice.

items.name: Husk of Dreams
modifiers: 50% chance for Flasks you use to not consume Charges
items.flavor_text: Yes... but what if?

items.name: Voll's Protector
modifiers: 25% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Hit
items.flavor_text: Although a great leader during the war, Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

items.name: Soul Mantle
modifiers: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Curse on you when your Totems die, ignoring Curse limit
items.flavor_text: The greatest mistakes cause suffering long after they have been made

items.name: The Mutable Star
modifiers: Defend against Hits as though you had 1% more Armour per 1% current Energy Shield
items.flavor_text: Through every great purge, and every fiery inquisition, the Twilight Order endured in secret.

items.name: Waveshaper
modifiers: Gain (30-50)% of Maximum Mana as Armour
items.flavor_text: "Move in ways your enemy does not expect. Confuse them with elegance and grace. They'll never see the axe coming." - Rakiata, Chieftain of the Tasalio Tribe

items.name: Couture of Crimson
modifiers: Life Leech can Overflow Maximum Life
items.flavor_text: It's often said of nobles that they live off their peasants... sometimes, it's truer than any suspect.

items.name: Sacrosanctum
modifiers: Damage taken Recouped as Life is also Recouped as Energy Shield
items.flavor_text: The Twilight Order rejected the gods, choosing instead to put their faith in each other.

items.name: Apron of Emiran
items.flavor_text: "Prepare the rack, boy. And be careful with those hooks!" - The Master Torturer's last words

items.name: Gloomform
modifiers: You have a Smoke Cloud around you while stationary
items.flavor_text: It was in this forsaken land, where mists shroud the world in mystery, that thieves, murderers, and outcasts, sought refuge.

items.name: Sierran Inheritance
modifiers: (30-50)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
The Effect of Chill on you is reversed
items.flavor_text: Born among the high peaks, many Mutewind live their entire lives in snow and ice.

items.name: The Dancing Mirage
modifiers: 20% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
100% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently
items.flavor_text: Be not where death falls.

items.name: Redflare Conduit
modifiers: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
Lose all Power Charges on reaching maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach maximum Power Charges
items.flavor_text: In all things, control.

items.name: Zerphi's Serape
items.flavor_text: Mortality is a curse. The cure is simple.

items.name: Morior Invictus
modifiers: (200-300)% increased Armour, Evasion and Energy Shield
items.flavor_text: The Unblinking Eye did not cower and wail. They stood against the end.

items.name: Legionstride
items.flavor_text: A wall of steel and muscle.

items.name: Corpsewade
items.flavor_text: Natural decay can be twisted to dark ends.

items.name: The Infinite Pursuit
modifiers: (80-100)% increased Chance to be afflicted by Ailments when Hit
25% increased Movement Speed while affected by an Ailment
items.flavor_text: We move to be closer to her, but the distance yet grows.

items.name: Trampletoe
modifiers: Deal 30% of Overkill damage to enemies within 2 metres of the enemy killed
items.flavor_text: The truly mighty are never outnumbered.

items.name: Birth of Fury
modifiers: Drop Ignited Ground while moving, which lasts 8 seconds and Ignites as though dealing Fire Damage equal to 10% of your maximum Life
items.flavor_text: As the sun rises and the light approaches, so too shall your enemies fear you.

items.name: Briarpatch
items.flavor_text: The druids walk the Grelwood without fear.

items.name: Gamblesprint
modifiers: Gain 0% to 40% increased Movement Speed at random when Hit, until Hit again
items.flavor_text: All your tomorrows lie ahead of you, unknown and snarled to the very last.

items.name: Thunderstep
items.flavor_text: Where legends tread, the world hearkens.

items.name: Bushwhack
items.flavor_text: Banished for his tragic failure, Erian learned to hunt to survive.

items.name: Luminous Pace
modifiers: 100% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
items.flavor_text: Blessed are those who tend the Grove.

items.name: Wanderlust
modifiers: Your speed is unaffected by Slows
items.flavor_text: All the world is my home.

items.name: Bones of Ullr
items.flavor_text: The dead man walks where the living fear to tread.

items.name: Wondertrap
modifiers: 50% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life
items.flavor_text: Wonders abound at death's door.

items.name: Windscream
modifiers: Curse Skills have (10-20)% increased Cast Speed
items.flavor_text: The mocking wind, a shielding spell, The haunting screams, a maddening hell

items.name: The Knight-errant
items.flavor_text: Some search forever for their path.

items.name: Darkray Vectors
modifiers: 5% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
items.flavor_text: "Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness, it was there, at every turn, waiting for him." - Azmerian legend

items.name: Obern's Bastion
items.flavor_text: The storm cannot sway those of sure footing.

items.name: Wake of Destruction
modifiers: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning damage to Attacks
Drop Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 8 seconds
items.flavor_text: Tempest's power given form, Flee before the walking storm.

items.name: Ghostmarch
items.flavor_text: The cursed ones march forever, On their hopeless, last endeavour.

items.name: Powertread
modifiers: +12% to Critical Damage Bonus per Power Charge
items.flavor_text: The combat stance used by Vaal nobles was as elegant as it was deadly.

items.name: Beetlebite
modifiers: Aggravate Bleeding on Enemies when they Enter your Presence
items.flavor_text: They crawl and chitter and swarm in the shadow of his presence.

items.name: Ab Aeterno
modifiers: (60-80)% increased Armour, Evasion and Energy Shield
10% less Movement and Skill Speed per Dodge Roll in the past 20 seconds
items.flavor_text: His enemy was for endurance forged. His own waned.

items.name: Treefingers
modifiers: Adds (6-10) to (12-16) Physical Damage to Attacks
items.flavor_text: The largest beings on Wraeclast are not flesh and blood.

items.name: Lochtonial Caress
modifiers: Share Charges with Allies in your Presence
items.flavor_text: Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing. Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

items.name: Dreadfist
items.flavor_text: What is worse, the sting of the past, the pain of the present, or the fear of the future?

items.name: Atziri's Acuity
modifiers: Leech from Critical Hits is instant
items.flavor_text: "The heart is the herald. It will tell me when it is best to strike." - Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Empire's Grasp
items.flavor_text: "I like my vassals at sword point, but my enemies as close as the hilt." - Emperor Chitus

items.name: Hateforge
modifiers: Gain (1-3) random Charge on reaching Maximum Rage
Lose all Rage on reaching Maximum Rage
items.flavor_text: The first Karui born on the fringes of the Vaal empire developed a blood fever born of corruption.

items.name: Northpaw
modifiers: Adds (3-5) to (8-10) Physical Damage to Attacks
Base Critical Hit Chance for Attacks with Weapons is 7%
items.flavor_text: Fight with the ferocity of the First Ones.

items.name: Grip of Winter
modifiers: Adds (3-5) to (6-8) Cold Damage to Attacks
(20-30)% increased Magnitude of Chill you inflict
items.flavor_text: After the eruption, the skies turned grey, ash began ot fall, and a chill set in...

items.name: Idle Hands
modifiers: 25% increased Attack Speed while on Full Mana
You count as on Full Mana while at 90% of maximum Mana or above
items.flavor_text: The devil finds work for idle hands.

items.name: Snakebite
modifiers: Targets can be affected by +1 of your Poisons at the same time
items.flavor_text: As the serpent shuns thought, It shuns fear. It strikes with the speed of wrath And the skill of compulsion.

items.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
items.flavor_text: Maligaro operated effortlessly, with great speed and terrible consequences.

items.name: Painter's Servant
modifiers: 33% of Elemental Damage Converted to Cold Damage
33% of Elemental Damage Converted to Fire Damage
33% of Elemental Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Gain (5-10)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Gain (5-10)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain (5-10)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Lightning Damage
items.flavor_text: Bloodshed on the crimson shores, longing for the endless sea. Treasures, life, I'd give it all just to capture thee.

items.name: Candlemaker
items.flavor_text: You can be the wick or the wax. Either way, your light goes out and mine goes on.

items.name: Doedre's Tenure
items.flavor_text: While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style, she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

items.name: Kitoko's Current
modifiers: Lightning Damage from Hits contributes to Electrocution Buildup
items.flavor_text: Reality is a puzzle. Ingenuity is power.

items.name: Demon Stitcher
modifiers: Sacrifice (5-15)% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell
items.flavor_text: Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury. One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh, until all that remained was a droplet of pure light: The first Vaal.

items.name: Nightscale
modifiers: 150% increased Mana Regeneration Rate if you've dealt a Critical Hit Recently
Cannot Regenerate Mana if you haven't dealt a Critical Hit Recently
items.flavor_text: Diamora sings not for hunger, but for longing.

items.name: Leopold's Applause
modifiers: Your Hits can Penetrate Elemental Resistances down to a minimum of -50%
items.flavor_text: "Keep smiling. The deepest cut comes not from insults, but from false praise."

items.name: Jarngreipr
modifiers: Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Physical Damage to Attacks
Strength can satisfy other Attribute Requirements of Melee Weapons and Melee Skills
items.flavor_text: The whispers of the old gods hum through the iron. They demand a hero.

items.name: Aurseize
items.flavor_text: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

items.name: Deathblow
items.flavor_text: Anticipation is a gift.

items.name: Valako's Vice
modifiers: 100% of Fire damage Converted to Lightning damage
items.flavor_text: Unlike the other gods, when he was born from the volcano, Valako rode the clouds of ash into the thundering sky.

items.name: Aerisvane's Wings
items.flavor_text: The strongest souls are forged through struggle and defeat.

items.name: Death Articulated
modifiers: Lose 5% of maximum Life per second
items.flavor_text: "The mind at the center of the swarm... K'Tash does the thinking... but it has only one thought... hate." - Rantings of a Templar prisoner, page ninety-four

items.name: Gravebind
modifiers: Enemies killed by anyone in your Presence count as being killed by you instead
items.flavor_text: Try as you like to hide the blood on your hands. You'll still know the truth.

items.name: Shackles of the Wretched
modifiers: You cannot be Chilled for 6 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 6 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 6 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 6 seconds after being Shocked
Curses you inflict are reflected back to you
items.flavor_text: Captivity breeds creativity.

items.name: Blueflame Bracers
modifiers: 100% of Fire Damage Converted to Cold Damage
items.flavor_text: The secret was lost with its maker.

items.name: The Prisoner's Manacles
modifiers: Debuffs you inflict have (20-30)% increased Slow Magnitude
items.flavor_text: Only once did Maligaro wonder if he'd gone too far. His greatest success took three entire legions to capture.

items.name: Plaguefinger
modifiers: All Damage from Hits Contributes to Poison Magnitude
items.flavor_text: Ulcers, scabs, and pocks, the third army makes its claim.

items.name: Killjoy
modifiers: Life Flasks do not recover Life
items.flavor_text: "Stitches? Wouldn't that defeat the purpose?" - Jeffry, Torturer's Apprentice

items.name: Hand of Wisdom and Action
modifiers: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks per 20 Intelligence
items.flavor_text: She thinks and we act. She acts and we think. Fragments of the whole that washes clean the skies.

items.name: Essentia Sanguis
modifiers: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning damage to Attacks
Life Leech is Converted to Energy Shield Leech
items.flavor_text: The darkest clouds clashed and coupled, giving birth to four lightning children of hate.

items.name: Blessed Bonds
modifiers: Inflict Cold Exposure on Igniting an Enemy
Inflict Fire Exposure on Shocking an Enemy
Inflict Lightning Exposure on Critical Hit
items.flavor_text: "We survived the endless winter. We endure the long summer. One day, spring will return the rains."

items.name: Sine Aequo
modifiers: (40-60)% increased Armour, Evasion and Energy Shield
Immobilise enemies at 50% buildup instead of 100%
Enemies Immobilised by you take 25% less Damage
items.flavor_text: The greatest warrior of his era fought with honour.

items.name: Horns of Bynden
modifiers: Every Rage also grants 1% increased Armour
items.flavor_text: The Younger Brother waded into Battle, shrugging off Blows.

items.name: Wings of Caelyn
modifiers: Every Rage also grants 1% increased Stun Threshold
items.flavor_text: The older brother rtetained calm in the midst of fury.

items.name: Ezomyte Peak
items.flavor_text: Centuries of servitude, a day of glory, an eternity of death.

items.name: Black Sun Crest
items.flavor_text: The beasts we fear the most are the ones who dwell in total darkness.

items.name: Thrillsteel
items.flavor_text: TWe may fight, and we may die, but in these moments of blood and battle, we truly live.

items.name: Deidbell
modifiers: Corpses in your Presence Explode when you Warcry, dealing 10% of their Life as Physical Damage
Warcry Skills have (20-30)% increased Area of Effect
items.flavor_text: May you never hear it toll.

items.name: Corona of the Red Sun
modifiers: When you Leech Life from a Hit, Allies in your Presence also Leech the same amount of Life
items.flavor_text: Coming soon

items.name: Blood Price
modifiers: Enemies in your Presence have at least 10% of Life Reserved
items.flavor_text: An eye for an eye makes the whole world dead.

items.name: Innsmouth
items.flavor_text: Beyond madness lies inspiration.

items.name: Goldrim
items.flavor_text: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

items.name: Radiant Grief
modifiers: Enemies in your Presence are Ignited as though dealt 100 Base Fire Damage
items.flavor_text: No man burns alone.

items.name: Elevore
items.flavor_text: Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

items.name: The Black Insignia
modifiers: Gain Tailwind on Critical Hit, no more than once per second
items.flavor_text: Brinerot pirates live in a perpetual blaze of glory, pushing their luck right to the end.

items.name: Starkonja's Head
modifiers: 150% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life
15% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Companion's Life before you
items.flavor_text: There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death, but merely a long sleep made eternal.

items.name: Heatshiver
modifiers: Gain 1% of Cold damage as Extra Fire damage per 1% Chill Magnitude on enemy
items.flavor_text: Give of your heated passions. Give of your cold resolve. You will be repaid.

items.name: Myris Uxor
items.flavor_text: The end always comes sooner than we think.

items.name: Alpha's Howl

items.name: Ironride
